Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 37th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2010...
Traded from Baltimore to Los Angeles (A) on 4/1/2010 (Going to LAA: P A. Reed, 1B W. Brown. Going to BAL: 2B M. Oloughlin)...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Cleveland on 7/7/2010 (Going to CLE: P S. Cassidy, RF M. Bradley, SS M. Tejada, P A. Reed. Going to LAA: P F. Rodriguez)...
Earned first career win on 4/25/2013...
Traded from Cleveland to Arizona on 7/31/2014 (Going to ARI: P H. Takahashi, P M. Delcarmen, P A. Reed. Going to CLE: RF M. Stanton, P M. Bumgarner, P D. Hudson)...
Had first career hit on 4/17/2016, off Garrett Mock (SDN)...
Traded from Arizona to Pittsburgh on 5/15/2017 (Going to ARI: P J. Soria. Going to PIT: P A. Reed)...
Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 2/6/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $5,750,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Arizona in 2019...
Signed as a free agent by Milwaukee on 2/9/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $3,570,000 per year...
